channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- MobileFirst Platform Foundation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- MobileFirst Platform Foundation

item.title: CVE-2017-1772|2024-08-05T13:39:32.247Z -- ibm -- mobilefirst%20platform%20foundation
item.description: IBM Worklight (IBM MobileFirst Platform Foundation 6.3, 7.0, 7.1, and 8.0) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 136786.
